about_the_game:
This game is created by @Darklord with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

Our game has garnered significant attention! On May 17th, itch officially recommended our game on Twitter. We are thrilled to receive such recognition and are grateful for the support and enthusiasm from the community. Are you ready to dive into this eerie and captivating journey? Don’t miss out—uncover the hidden secrets in our game!

What Is the Game About:

Today Is the Wedding Day!

In this first-person adventure horror game, you'll embark on a journey to a secluded and isolated mountain village, where a chilling tale unfolds. A tyrant brutally attacks a little girl on the verge of adulthood, leaving her dead in an abandoned temple, setting the tragic story in motion. Her parents, stopped by fear of the tyrant's authority, are unable to seek justice for their daughter. But they cannot bear the thought of her resting in loneliness forever. To bring her peace, they decide to have a ghost marriage as her funeral. As a newcomer to the village, you unwittingly stumble upon this haunting world, have no choice but to face the wrath of the sorrow ghost bride, doing everything in your power to escape this eerie village.

In the depths of this forsaken place, you will explore an eerie Eastern village enveloped in darkness and mystery. Your task is to uncover cryptic clues, solve enigmatic puzzles, and navigate dangerous terrain as you strive to escape the spirit's grasp. Discovering the truth behind this spectral tragedy is your only chance of escaping!

WHY GHOST MARRIAGE? In their culture, a family will suffer ill fortune if there is an unmarried grave in the family tomb. A ghost marriage allows the dead to be buried together as husband and wife, placate these restless spirits and bring harmony back to the afterlife.

CAUTION! If your heart isn’t strong enough! During the game, you'll come across different supernatural occurrences and occasional moments that might startle you.

BE MENTALLY PREPARED! The game consists of five chapters, including an introductory section and a final chapter.

Improvements Plan:

Scene and Object Quality: The current game scenes and objects lack the level of detail and polish that we seek for. We will improve the visual quality of sceneries and objects by including more details and textures to create a more immersive experience.

Insufficient Instruction: Players may struggle due to lack of guidance. We will add a more detailed tutorial and in-game instructions to help players navigate difficult portions, resulting in a more enjoyable gameplay experience.

Key Features:

  • Intriguing storylines and challenging puzzles

  • Ingenious mechanism design

  • Unveiling ancient and mysterious oriental feudal folklore

Designer's Comment:

Hi everyone, this is Darkload. I'd want to thank everyone who assisted me during the creation process, especially Yahaha Horror Game Kit, which helped me bring the concept of a ghost marriage into reality. Throughout the design process, I used a lot of real historical materials and images to try to rebuild the most realistic cultural story and finally obtained acceptable results. In the future, I plan to continue developing this series and attempt to restore more stories from actual history. If you enjoy Wedding Day, please stay connected!

Besides, I'd love to hear feedback, so provide your thoughts if you have any suggestions! Thanks you ALL!!! :-)

short_description: As I reached adulthood, a village bully murdered me and abandoned my body in a temple. Instead of seeking revenge, my fearful parents arranged a ghostly marriage to appease my soul. But the pain will never cease, and my hatred will never fade.
